Raivo OTP

Simply the best authenticator

A native, lightweight, non-commercial and secure multi-factor authenticator that synchronises your one-time passwords across all of your Apple devices.

Synchronisation

Sync your one-time passwords to iCloud and never lose access to them again.

Local backup

Stay in control. Export your one-time passwords to encrypted ZIP archives.

Customisation

Add (custom) icons to your one-time passwords and apply effects to them.

Raivo for MacOS

Use the MacOS companion app to send your one-time passwords to your Mac.

Powerfull search

Search through all of your one-time passwords with one tap under your thumb.

Native & open source

Experience the fast native app built in Swift 5. And it's open source too!
